Title: Dileep on working with Adoor Gopalakrishnan and his choice of roles
Content: That Dileep is a complete entertainer needs no validation. His hits have given him a place right at the top of the Malayalam film industry. Some of his characters would not have been seen on screen b
Author: Saraswathy Nagarajan
